H0.text: The cabasa, used especially in Latin music, is what sort of instrument. String

H1.text: The cabasa, used especially in Latin music, is what sort of instrument. Wind

H2.text: The cabasa, used especially in Latin music, is what sort of instrument. Electronic

H3.text: The cabasa, used especially in Latin music, is what sort of instrument. Percusion

A4.text: The cabasa, similar to the shekere, is a percussion instrument that is constructed with loops of steel ball chain wrapped around a wooden cylinder.
